Dear Administrator,\n I\'m reporting this spot because

"What you need for the app to work:

"
"- Location services (GPS,…) have to be activated and the app needs the rights to " "access them.
" "- Access to the internet (Wi-Fi, mobile data,…) has to be available and the app" "needs the rights to use it.
" "- The Android version installed on your device has to be APK version 23 (Marshmallow)" "or higher.


"
"What this app is for:

"
"This app is meant for people to share places they find interesting or useful with others" "and to comment on and rate the places shared by others. 


"
"How to...?

"
"→ Navigate the map:
"
"Navigation works like in the Google Maps app.
" "Drag the map to view other parts of it, pinch the map with two fingers or spread them to" "zoom in and out or turn them to rotate.
" "Alternatively, double tap the map to zoom in or tap with two fingers to zoom out.
" "If the map is turned, a press on the compass button in the top left corner returns the" "rotation to its initial state. A press on the button in the top right corner returns the" "view to your position.

"
"→ See spot details:
"
"To see the details of a spot, click on its marker on the map. A speech bubble with the" "spots name, description and type will pop up.
" "To see more details, click on the speech bubble.
" "A screen will pop up which contains:
" "- The name of the spot
" "- Its distance from you
" "- Its type
" "- Its average user rating (1…5 stars)
" "- Its description
" "- One or more pictures, which can be swiped through (if spot-creator uploaded some)
" "- Comments of users, containing their ratings
" "- If logged in, a button (⊕) to write your own comment

"
"→ Log in with your Google account:
"
"While on the map, you can open a side drawer by clicking on the three stripes in the top" "left corner of the screen, or by swiping inwards from the left border of the screen.
" "By pressing the top button in the drawer, a login screen appears in which you can select" "the account with which you want to log in.

"
"→ Add a spot to the map:
"
"Spots can only be created while being logged into a Google account.
" "To add a spot, click the "Add Marker"-button in the drawer. A blue marker will appear in" "the middle of the map. This marker can be dragged to the desired location for the new" "spot. To proceed with the spot-creation, click the blue ⊕-button in the bottom right" "corner of the screen.
" "Doing so will open another screen which contains a form you have to fill out with" "information about the spot. A click on the button with the camera-symbol opens the camera" "in your smartphone. By taking a photo and clicking "OK" the picture is added to the" "spot. After filling out all the lines, complete the creation with a click on the" ""create"-button.

"
"→ Add a comment and rating to a spot:
"
"Commenting and rating can only be done while being logged into a Google account.
" "To add a comment to a spot, open its detail screen and click on the red ⊕-button.
" "A new screen will pop up in which you can give a rating by clicking the desired amount of" "stars and which contains a line where the comment can be written.
" "A click on the blue ⊕-button in the bottom right corner will add the comment.

"
"→ Remove a comment from a spot:
"
"You can only remove comments you are the author of.
" "While in a spot's detail screen, find your comment and click on the red ×.

"
"→ Remove a spot:
"
"Spots can not be removed directly but have to be reported.
" "While in a spot's detail screen, click the button in the top right corner of the screen." "this will open your mail program with a mail-template in which you only have to add a" "reason for the report. 

"
